metadata.title: CVE-2018-11205 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A out of bounds read was discovered in H5VM_memcpyvv in H5VM.c in the HDF HDF5 1.10.2 library. It could allow a remote denial of service or information disclosure attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
